title: Santa

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Review a player and determine them to be Good or Bad.
- Gift a player an item during the day. They are notified.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Town, Neutral Benign, Neutral Evil and Detection Immune roles appear Good. All other roles appear Bad.
- If you are visited during a night, you cannot gift the next day.
- You cannot gift yourself.
- You may gift one of the following items:
Gun: Allows a player to deal an Astral Basic attack instead of their normal abilities.
Vest: Manual ability. Allows a player to gain Basic defense the night they use this instead of performing their normal ability.
Knife: Allows a player to deal a Powerful attack instead of their normal abilities. The slashed target will die two nights later unless protected by any death-preventing effect. They are notified.
Gauntlet: The target player can activate this to astralize their visits the night they do so.
Helmet: The target player can activate this to become Control and Redirection immune the night they do so.
Glasses: The target player can activate this to become Roleblock Immune the night they do so.
